TopicTitle: Help! I can't find Camera Tools Button in my KSP UI.

Articles.Content:
I install Camera Tools mod, but I can't find any changes in my game UI, so, I don't know how to use it? maybe there is some hotkey that can active Camera Tools?

This is list that is my all mods:

EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements

MechJeb2

scatterer

Squad

SquadExpansion

StockVisualEnhancements

ModuleManager.3.0.7.dll

23 minutes ago, krosshuang said:

This is list that is my all mods:

EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements

MechJeb2

scatterer

Squad

SquadExpansion

StockVisualEnhancements

ModuleManager.3.0.7.dll

Well, if this is a list of all of your mods, you should actually install camera tools

Ok, seriously: Which KSP version do you use und which camera tool version did you install? The original mod was build for KSP 1.0.5 but there is a fork of the mod which got updated to KSP 1.4:

https://github.com/jrodrigv/CameraTools/releases/tag/v1.10.0

8 hours ago, 4x4cheesecake said:

Well, if this is a list of all of your mods, you should actually install camera tools

Ok, seriously: Which KSP version do you use und which camera tool version did you install? The original mod was build for KSP 1.0.5 but there is a fork of the mod which got updated to KSP 1.4:

https://github.com/jrodrigv/CameraTools/releases/tag/v1.10.0

Great! It works, maybe I use a wrong version camera tool. Thank you very much
